revised_title: Recent Bibliography on the History of the Royal Society
tldr: This article provides a bibliography of recent books and articles related to the history of the Royal Society and its Fellows. It includes works on notable figures such as Joseph Lister, Robert Brown, and John Tyndall, as well as topics like the origins of Gay-Lussac's law and the fine structure of living matter.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
